programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 - I'm in the Back of a Truck
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 When a man having breakfast at home spots two men picking the lock on his back door he calls 9-1-1 but then wonders if he called too late.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All - A Murder in Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In 1989, 21-year-old Lyle and 18-year-old Erik Menendez walked into their parents' den and killed them.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All - A Family With a Dirty Secret
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The Trial of the Century takes a shocking turn when the defense says Erik and Lyle Menendez killed their parents after years of sexual abuse.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All - Abuse Excuse?
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Erik Menendez recalls his mother's decline in the years leading up to the murders and looks on in agony as his brother Lyle testifies, vividly describing the abuse at the hands of their father.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All - Trials and Reversals
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 The first trial ends in a stunning surprise verdict. Erik alone takes us inside the prep for his second trial, his unlikely connection with OJ Simpson, and why he alone is left to speak for both the brothers

programme.title: The First 48: Body of Evidence - Body of Evidence
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 146 When dismembered body parts are found floating in Miami's Biscayne Bay, Det. Orlando Silva and the Miami homicide team work around the clock to solve one of the most brutal murders South Florida has ever seen.

programme.title: The First 48 - 10 Pounds
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 4 In Birmingham, Detective Chris Anderson returns to his childhood neighborhood to investigate the murder of a man killed over ten pounds of marijuana.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Stolen Lives/Crimson Trail
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 In Miami, Florida, 25-year-old Pedro Roteta is stabbed in the middle of the street and left to die. Despite video of the murder and a confession the defense attempts to get immunity based on the controversial "Stand Your Ground" law.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Prince of Darkness / Last Words
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 In Harris County Texas, a young mother of three daughters is found in her trailer with her throat slashed. Investigators arrest her alleged killer with the help of a key witness.

programme.title: The First 48: 15th Anniversary - Chain of Death (#405/#406)
programme.desc: Season 19, Episode 99 A young mother and her best friend are gunned down in broad daylight. This sets off a chain of events that Tulsa Homicide never could have imagined.

programme.title: The First 48: Body of Evidence - Body of Evidence
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 146 When dismembered body parts are found floating in Miami's Biscayne Bay, Det. Orlando Silva and the Miami homicide team work around the clock to solve one of the most brutal murders South Florida has ever seen.

programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 4 In Birmingham, Detective Chris Anderson returns to his childhood neighborhood to investigate the murder of a man killed over ten pounds of marijuana.

programme.title: Rainbow Reef Relaxation 2 - Rainbow Reef Relaxation 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Vibrant underwater reefs, including many scenes which no longer look as depicted due to coral bleaching.

programme.title: Lake Tahoe Shoreline Rocks - Lake Tahoe Shoreline Rocks
programme.desc: Season 1, The shoreline of Lake Tahoe.

programme.title: The Soothing Sun - The Soothing Sun
programme.desc: Season 1, Rejoice and relax in the splendor of the glorious Sun for a full hour, with this new video by David Huting.

programme.title: Sunny Getaways - White Beach: Philippines
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Lazing the day away on a white sand beach in the Philippines as the sun gently sets on the horizon.

programme.title: Wharariki Beach II: New Zealand - Wharariki Beach II: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Featuring a rugged coastline, especially at low tide, which opens up vast sandy beaches.

programme.title: Good Morning - Playa Madama, Dominican Republic
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A view of Playa Madama, an unspoiled beach framed by high bluffs at the edge of the Dominican Republic.

programme.title: Broken Beach: Indonesia - Broken Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Season 1, Exploring the caves and sea tunnels of a natural pool surrounded by cliffs and stunning views.

programme.title: A Day in Paradise - Uninhabited Island, NE Fiji Islands
programme.desc: Season 1, Filmed in 2013 by David Huting, the tiny island is hidden off the northeastern coast of the outer Fiji Islands (near Taveuni), and boasts a perfect white sandy beach.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Cherokee
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 The body of 20-year-old Sophia Arnold is found on the banks of the Mississippi River. Police interview two men whose stories don't match up. Chris Hansen unfolds the horrific truth... and discovers which one of them murdered Sophia - and why.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - A Trust Betrayed
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 The tragic 1999 disappearance investigation of Hannah Hill in in Akron, Ohio spans nearly 13 years before her family gets justice. Chris Hansen discovers it was a heart-breaking case of a young woman's trust - betrayed.

programme.title: The First 48 - Last Wish
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 14 In Miami, after a celebrating his 46th birthday with family, a man is found dead on a residential sidewalk.

programme.title: The First 48 - Road Hazard/Cold
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 17 In Birmingham, Det. Chris Anderson works to unravel the mystery of a motorcycle club president shot in the head after being run off the road. And Louisville Det. Corey Cadwell races against the clock to catch the killer.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Good Man Down
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 13 In Cleveland, Ohio, an aspiring police officer is gunned down during a vicious nightclub brawl, and it's all caught on tape.

programme.title: After the First 48 - A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 In Harris County Texas, a 41-year-old woman is killed in her home by four masked men. Investigators have an idea of who did, but can they get enough evidence to prove it?

programme.title: After the First 48 - Brutal Business
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 In the Dallas Neighborhood of Oak Cliff, two young men are shot in the head inside a drug house, their bodies, found burned in the trunk of a car. Investigators scramble to find eyewitnesses to the crime.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Trail of Evidence
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In Harris County Texas, a 38-year-old man is stabbed to death in his own home leaving behind two children and his wife. Investigators track down the suspect thanks to surveillance video and some good old fashion detective work.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Body Parts in My Pocket
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 74 A California serial killer shows up at a local sheriff's department with a victim's body part in his jacket pocket.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Menace to Society
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 75 A serial predator leaves a trail of bodies along the southeastern United States.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Burial He Wanted
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 76 The disappearance of a wealthy retiree in South Florida quickly turns from a missing person's case to a full blown homicide investigation.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Green Widow
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 77 The murder of a man inside his suburban Los Angeles home sets off a chain reaction of murder, conspiracy, and furious cover ups, which ultimately point back to a mastermind who's in it for the money.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Stripped for Cash
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 40 When a rotting corpse is discovered in the trunk of a car, detectives uncover a sordid plot that includes a nouveau riche computer geek and a pair of seasoned golddiggers.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - All Brawn, No Brains
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 41 Looking to make a quick buck, two crooked trainers kidnap and kill their wealthy client. And though he survives to tell the tale, police dismiss his outrageous story.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A young German grifter moves to America, adopts various identities and kills many people along the way.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Colcester Rapist
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 25 A serial rapist stalks and preys on elderly women. Only a revolution in forensic science can strike fear into the heart of this predator.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Atomic Dog
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 26 A self-appointed angel of death on a mission beyond the law disappears into the shadowy underground that supports and protects him. But when the sniper’s mission moves to murder, a city is thrown into a blind panic that spreads across the country.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Reunion
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 181 When the head of the Klingon high council passes on, Picard finds himself in the middle of the struggle for the now-vacant position. Meanwhile, Worf re-unites with a past love, only to find he now has a son.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Future Imperfect
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 182 Riker has to quit his birthday party during a so-far uneventful patrol voyage at the Neutral Zone to head an away team when a Romulan secret base is found on a planet which was believed uninhabited.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Final Mission
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 183 Before leaving for Starfleet Academy, Wesley Crusher accompanies Captain Picard on a dangerous mission.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Loss
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 184 As an unknown force drags the Enterprise, Deanna Troi struggles with the loss of her powers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Data's Day
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 185 Data tries to comprehend the complex emotions between O'Brien and Keiko, who are about to be married.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Wounded
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 186 After being fired upon by a Cardassian vessel, Picard races against time to find out the facts behind the Cardassian commander's claim that the Federation attacked one of their outposts.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Devil's Due
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 187 While answering a distress call, Picard finds himself not sure of exactly who he is dealing with, but he's sure he's NOT dealing with the planet's version of The Devil, as she claims to be.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Clues
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 188 Effects of passing through a wormhole give the Enterprise crew a sense that they were unconscious for more than the thirty seconds they've been led to believe.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - First Contact
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 189 Commander William Riker has been on an acculturation mission under an alias for months on the Arkonian planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Galaxy's Child
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 190 While the Enterprise is in a star-base, Lt. Commander Geordi La Forge gets a very special visitor, brilliant engineering designer Dr. Leah Brahms, who he feels to know almost intimately as a 'hologram version' of herself with 'whom' he bonded.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Night Terrors
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 191 The Enterprise has finally tracked the missing starship USS Britain. Counselor Deanna Troi senses trouble with the life on board and joins Riker's boarding party.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Identity Crisis
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 192 Lt. Commander Geordi La Forge and an old friend fight to defeat a parasite that is trying to transform them into another species.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Nth Degree
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 193 When assigned to investigate an unknown probe, Lt. Barclay is electrocuted through a shuttlecraft's computer, where he receives an unexplainable boost of confidence and a vast increase in his knowledge.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Qpid
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 194 The Enterprise is at Tegus 3, to host the Federation archaeologists council's annual symposium, where Picard is to give the key-note lecture on its enigmatic ruins, now forbidden to outsiders.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Come Wander with Me
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 34 A singer's song becomes tragically real.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Bewitchin' Pool
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 36 Two unhappy children find a happy escape in a swimming pool.

programme.title: Dark Rising: Warrior of Worlds - Season's Change
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 This is a classic hero's story. Young local miner Nathan Mallstrom finds himself caught in the middle of an ancient battle for the Earth. Summer Vale, a super-soldier with demon DNA is there to guide him in the battle.

programme.title: Dark Rising: Warrior of Worlds - The Trankartak
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 This is a classic hero's story. Young local miner Nathan Mallstrom finds himself caught in the middle of an ancient battle for the Earth. Summer Vale, a super-soldier with demon DNA is there to guide him in the battle.

programme.title: Day The World Ended - Day The World Ended
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In a post-apocalyptic world after an atomic war, seven disparate people find themselves in a protected valley in the home of a survivalist and his beautiful daughter.

programme.title: End of The World - End of The World
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Professor Andrew Boran has decoded messages from space which predict major disasters occurring throughout the globe. The aliens responsible for them are about to lure the unwitting scientist and his wife into aiding them in their plan to destroy Earth.

programme.title: Masters of the Universe - Masters Of The Universe
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The fantastic exploits of He-Man and his arch-rival, the evil Skeletor, are brought to the big screen for the first time in this live-action adventure.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Eyewitness
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Tessa claims to see a woman murdered, but there's no body and only Duncan believes her.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 Warning comes from MacLeod's old friend Darius that Grayson, a former protégé, is stalking Darius' other students - among them, possibly, MacLeod.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Initiations
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 Chakotay faces an unlikely enemy: a Kazon boy who hopes to achieve warrior status by killing him.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Projections
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 The ship's holographic doctor experiences a world where illusion and reality collide.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Elogium
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 The ship is surrounded by creatures whose presence accelerates Kes' reproductive process and threatens Voyager's key operating systems.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Non Sequitur
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 Ensign Harry Kim awakens on Earth, where he's shocked to learn there's no record of his assignment on Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Twisted
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 A strange spatial distortion afflicts the ship and has the entire crew literally lost on their own ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Parturition
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 Neelix and Paris must put aside their romantic rivalry over Kes after they crash-land on a toxic planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Persistence Of Vision
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 A mysterious force puts the crew in a delusional state that causes their most deeply buried thoughts and desires to surface.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tattoo
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 Chakotay is stranded on a planet inhabited by natives with ties to his ancestors.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Cold Fire
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Kes makes contact with Ocampa spacefarers and the female Caretaker, who may have the power to send the crew home.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Maneuvers
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 The theft of a transporter module by Kazon forces thrusts Chakotay into an explosive confrontation with his traitorous former lover Seska.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Resistance
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 Janeway must escape from a city under siege by the Mokra, a brutal regime determined to crush the growing resistance movement against it.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Prototype
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 After Torres reactivates a humanoid robot, she's drawn into a war between robotic enemies.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Alliances
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 Hoping to strengthen Voyager's strategic position in the quadrant, Janeway reluctantly seeks an alliance with the Kazon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Threshold
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Paris makes history by becoming the first person to cross the transwarp threshold, but could pay for the achievement with his life.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 6
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 This episode includes: Son of Sam Pt. 1, Mystery Cowboy, Slain Swain & UD and Update: Badlands.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 24
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 24 This episode includes: Miram's Memory & UD, Ghost Blimp, Fugitive Fireman & UD and Russian Roulette & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 23
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 23 This episode includes: Motorcycle Mom & UD, Update: Ready Teller Robbery, White Bird, Strychnine Death and Missing Mariners.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 4
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 This episode includes: Zel's Odyssey (Pts. 1 & 2), Wally's Hidden River, UD: DJ Death and Looking for Christopher & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 5 This episode includes: Carson Prince & UD, Fake Dr. Fraud & UD, Hero Molester & UD and Missing Theatre Student & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 10
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 10 This episode includes: Oliver, a Manpanzee, Dennis Keith Smith & UD, Blood Ties, Desperately Seeking Susan and Little Beauty Queen Death.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 21
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 21 This episode includes: Dennis Cole's Son, UD: Train Wreck Amnesia, Newsman's Lost Love & UD, Amish Hostage Murder & UD and Plateau Vision.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9

programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 This episode includes: Bad Chief, Locust Grove, Update: Pizza Man and Perpetual Partners.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 18
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 18 This episode includes: Mother's Instinct, Temple President Murder, Swoops & Squats & UD, Grady's Bible and Rapist MD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 18
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 18 This episode includes: Power of Prayer, Dress Up Escape, Dakota's Double Death and Casino Disappearance.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 21
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 21 This episode includes: Li'l Miss & UD, Lost Dutchman's Mine Pts. 1 & 2 and Kiss of Death.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 1
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 1 This episode includes: Who Plugged Bugsy?, Colorado Cop Killer & UD, Suddenly Psychic, The Wrong Grave and Wiseguy Wannabe & UD.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Jungle Goddess - Jungle Goddess
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 An heiress stranded in Africa is made queen of the jungle in the feature film and Bela Lugosi stars in the short The Phantom Creeps. Joel and the Bots create their own infomercial.

programme.title: MST3K: The Mask - MST3K: The Mask
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Manhunt In Space - Manhunt In Space
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 13 Joel and the Bots watch an early episode of the soap opera behemoth General Hospital, before watching a movie made of several edited television episodes about space pirates.

programme.title: MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula - MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.

programme.title: MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula - MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.

programme.title: MST3K: The Batwoman - MST3K: The Batwoman
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Emily's crew watch a scantily-clad Mexican superhero take on a mad scientist and his aquatic super-soldiers in THE BATWOMAN (1968).

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Village of the Giants - Village of the Giants
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 23 In Village of the Giants, a child genius creates a growth formula that ends up in the hands of some incredibly annoying teenagers.

programme.title: The Water is Wide - The Water is Wide
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 During the late 1960s, a novice schoolteacher comes to a small island off the coast of South Carolina with the hope of bringing literacy and self-respect to the undereducated, African-American children living there.

programme.title: A Majestic Christmas - A Majestic Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Nell must take her hometown playhouse to a multiplex, against her own wishes. She hopes a crash course in Christmas will give the new owner, Connor, a change of heart. Stars Jerrika Hinton and Christian Vincent.

programme.title: Hitched for the Holidays - Hitched for the Holidays
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. Both Rob Marino and Julie Green are feeling pressure to be in a relationship.

programme.title: A Majestic Christmas - A Majestic Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Nell must take her hometown playhouse to a multiplex, against her own wishes. She hopes a crash course in Christmas will give the new owner, Connor, a change of heart. Stars Jerrika Hinton and Christian Vincent.

programme.title: The Shell Seekers - The Shell Seekers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A reclusive British matron of comfortable means suffers a near-fatal heart attack and decides it's time to get her life in order. Stars Angela Lansbury.

programme.title: Durango - Durango
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A young man goes on a cattle drive in Ireland in 1939 and must deal with a scheming cattle baron and tries to win the heart of a girl. Stars Brenda Fricker. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

programme.title: The Echo of Thunder - The Echo of Thunder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A young girl goes to live with her father and stepmother in the Australian outback after her mother's death. Stars Judy Davis and Jamey Sheridan. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: In From the Night - In From the Night
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A writer (Marcia Gay Harden) forms a compassionate bond with her nephew (Taylor Handley) after the troubled teen runs away from his parents.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Collateral Damage
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 12 Complications arise when lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell becomes the victim of powerful and dangerous technology that allows individuals to share memories with each other. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Ripple Effect
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 13 Stargate Command is baffled by the arrival of several virtually identical SG-1 teams and must find a way to return them to their respective universes before calamity occurs. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Stronghold
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 14 Daniel fears the worst when Teal'c mysteriously disappears after investigating corruption. His fears are confirmed when he finds that Jaffa have been kidnapped and brainwashed. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Ethon
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 15 SG-1 sets out to destroy a massive and deadly weapon invented by their increasingly powerful foe, the Ori. If not, the Caledonian Federation and its people will be destroyed. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Off The Grid
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 16 Hank Landry (Beau Bridges) and the rest of the Stargate team plan an offensive when they learn that the Goa'uld Ba'al is in the United States and is once again regaining power. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Scourge
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 17 A crop of genetically engineered insects turns deadly, forcing the SG-1 team to destroy them before they and the visiting international diplomats becoming their next victims. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Arthur's Mantle
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 18 While Teal'c sets off to investigate foul play on a Jaffa planet, Mitchell, Carter and Daniel become out of phase while experimenting with a powerful and ancient device. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Inquisition
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 A newly formed galactic coalition extends an invitation to Lt. Col. John Sheppard and his team to represent Atlantis at their next meeting. But on arrival, the team is immediately detained and must stand trial for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Prodigal
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 14 Atlantis is suddenly plunged into darkness, with only the top tier of the central tower unaffected. As Sheppard and McKay attempt to get to the top level, they discover that a force field has been established to prevent them from gaining access.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Remnants
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 15 While Richard Woolsey (Robert Picardo) struggles to keep his position as the leader of Atlantis, and McKay (David Hewlett) and Zelenka (David Nykl) investigate a mysterious find, Sheppard is captured by an old enemy with plans to invade the city.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Brain Storm
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 16 When the Atlantis team is given two weeks of vacation leave, Dr. Rodney McKay reluctantly accepts an invitation by his former rival, Malcolm Tunney, to attend a scientific demonstration that he claims will be the solution to global warming.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Infection
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 17 The team prepares for the worst as board a Wraith hive ship over Atlantis. They're surprised to find the Wraith crew in stasis when a malfunction on the hive ship releases the remaining crew… who have been cannibalizing one another for food.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Identity
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 18 When Dr. Jennifer Keller is observed behaving very strangely, extensive testing reveals nothing abnormal. But McKay’s investigation leads him to suspect that Dr. Keller and Neela Casol, a notorious criminal, have switched consciousnesses.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Vegas
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 19 In an alternate universe, Detective John Sheppard is with the Las Vegas Police Department and begins to investigate a strange series of murders believed to be the work of a bizarre serial killer. Has life changed or is this a dangerous Wraith plot?
